title: Alex Trochut : Illustrative Type
content:
Just stumbled across this talent. [http://www.alextrochut.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033919/http:/www.alextrochut.com/ "http://www.alextrochut.com/")  
His work is very organic, almost alive in fact. My favorite is the T-shirt design for Beautiful/Decay “The Hyper Spectrum”. It must have taken him a while to do that design.

Enjoy.

 [‹ Vector Patterns for Currency, etc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41177 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type on the Sony Reader ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29470 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content:
His work is definitely some of the best Ive seen. I esp like the diesel stuff.

the sites not so easy to use though...
